title: I Can’t Reset!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Phew~ That bath totally reenergized me~ Come on, Ai, it’s your turn.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okaaay......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Don’t just say “okay” and stay there. When are you gonna stop watching the video!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aww! I just wanna watch a bit more!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Isn’t that exactly what you said when I told you I was going to take a bath?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Did I say that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Didn’t you say you have a great memory?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm... Then Karin, why don’t you get in the bath with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I just got out of it, though......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>But I can’t reset myself! Let’s watch the video in the bath together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I guess I have no choice then. Let’s review our performance together then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
